issue.title: Application crashes on startup with NullReferenceException
issue.body:
When I try to start the app, it immediately crashes.

### What I See
Just a crash, no UI appears

### My Setup
Windows 11, version 3.0.0

### Error
```
System.NullReferenceException: Object reference not set to an instance of an object.
   at MyApp.Startup.Initialize() in Startup.cs:line 42
   at MyApp.Program.Main(String[] args) in Program.cs:line 15
```
